step_feedback.feedback: Good job initiating the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Try to keep your elbows a little closer to your body for a smoother roll.
Excellent control in this step! You're effectively moving your shoulders in a circular motion. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
Great finishing movement! Your shoulders are rolling nicely. Ensure your wrists stay relaxed throughout the exercise.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your body and breathing deeply as you roll your shoulders back. This helps improve mobility and lymphatic flow.
